Player History
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $1,408,000 per year...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/3/1985, off Brian Fisher (NYY)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/7/1985, off Vida Blue (NYG)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/1985, hitting .406 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Injured on 10/9/1985 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Series with Toronto in 1985...
Won Gold Glove Award at Shortstop in 1985...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Toronto in 1987...
5/17/1988: Signed a contract extension with Toronto, $5,850,000 per year, for 3 years.
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Detroit on 6/1/1989...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/1989, hitting .538 with 2 HR, 13 RBI...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/2/1990 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Injured on 10/3/1991 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Released by Toronto on 10/14/1991...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/16/1992 to a 2-year deal worth $6,666,666 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Seattle on 5/17/1992...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
